Title: AI Engineer
Description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.

We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is ideal for engineers with demonstrable skills in AI as well as for software engineers who have recently transitioned to AI and ML expertise, and offers an opportunity to develop your craft whilst working closely with clients on delivering AI solutions to real-world challenges.

Job Summary

We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong intuition for AI and a genuine enthusiasm in building robust, scalable solutions to power innovative digital experiences. The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with a deep enthusiasm for advancing AI capabilities.

What We Offer


A chance to work closely with global brands on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and truly push the boundaries of what's possible.
A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


As an AI Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:


Assisting our clients in clarifying their questions and determining if using AI is a suitable solution for them
You understand the limitations of a model and how to address them within the product’s UX
Implementing AI-as-a-Service (e.g., OpenAI, Claude LLMs) in projects; you assess when these services are a good option and understand any potential limitations
Being familiar with pre-trained models and available datasets and the ability to apply them if existing AI services fall short for the use case at hand
Validating, deploying, monitoring, and maintaining built models, ensuring they can be used at scale
Developing and maintaining end-to-end data pipelines and machine learning workflows, optimizing for performance and reliability
Working with diverse, cross-functional teams on projects that deliver groundbreaking AI solutions for global brands


It’s a plus (not a requirement) if you have additional experience in:


PyTorch, Tensorflow
Transfer learning, few-shot learning, PEFT and LoRa
Multi-modal transformer models, RLHF


Who You Are

We Value Candidates Who Demonstrate


Great delivery skills: Proven capability to deliver AI solutions
Strong AI intuition: A deep understanding of AI concepts
Curiosity: Enthusiasm for emerging technologies, creativity in problem-solving, and an eagerness to learn in a rapidly evolving AI landscape
You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


Why Umain?

Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.

Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.

Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.

Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.

Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?

If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.

We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.
Show more
HTML:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.

We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is ideal for engineers with demonstrable skills in AI as well as for software engineers who have recently transitioned to AI and ML expertise, and offers an opportunity to develop your craft whilst working closely with clients on delivering AI solutions to real-world challenges.

Job Summary

We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong intuition for AI and a genuine enthusiasm in building robust, scalable solutions to power innovative digital experiences. The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with a deep enthusiasm for advancing AI capabilities.

What We Offer

  • A chance to work closely with global brands on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and truly push the boundaries of what's possible.
  • A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
  • A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
  • Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.

As an AI Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:

  • Assisting our clients in clarifying their questions and determining if using AI is a suitable solution for them
  • You understand the limitations of a model and how to address them within the product’s UX
  • Implementing AI-as-a-Service (e.g., OpenAI, Claude LLMs) in projects; you assess when these services are a good option and understand any potential limitations
  • Being familiar with pre-trained models and available datasets and the ability to apply them if existing AI services fall short for the use case at hand
  • Validating, deploying, monitoring, and maintaining built models, ensuring they can be used at scale
  • Developing and maintaining end-to-end data pipelines and machine learning workflows, optimizing for performance and reliability
  • Working with diverse, cross-functional teams on projects that deliver groundbreaking AI solutions for global brands

It’s a plus (not a requirement) if you have additional experience in:

  • PyTorch, Tensorflow
  • Transfer learning, few-shot learning, PEFT and LoRa
  • Multi-modal transformer models, RLHF

Who You Are

We Value Candidates Who Demonstrate

  • Great delivery skills: Proven capability to deliver AI solutions
  • Strong AI intuition: A deep understanding of AI concepts
  • Curiosity: Enthusiasm for emerging technologies, creativity in problem-solving, and an eagerness to learn in a rapidly evolving AI landscape
  • You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
  • You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
  • You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
  • You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.

Why Umain?

Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.

Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.

Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.

Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.

Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?

If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.

Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.

We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

Title: Data Scientist inom AI och Automatisering
Description:
Garantum är en privatägd koncern verksamma inom förmögenhetsförvaltning för privatpersoner, företag och institutioner. Vi eftersträvar långsiktiga och nära kundrelationer med ömsesidigt förtroende för att kunna leverera individanpassad rådgivning med hög kvalitet lokalt nära våra kunder. Garantum har idag över 190 anställda i koncernen och 140 anknutna rådgivare runt om i Sverige och Norge.

Tjänsten vi erbjuder

Som Data Scientist hos oss kommer du att arbeta med att utveckla AI-baserade lösningar som optimerar arbetsflöden och förbättrar användarupplevelsen. Du kommer att lösa komplexa problem med hjälp av avancerad dataanalys och implementera långsiktiga AI-strategier. Analys och modellering blir också en viktig del av din vardag – att arbeta med stora datamängder och omvandla dem till affärsmässiga insikter är kärnan i ditt arbete. Vidare kommer du att samarbeta nära med olika avdelningar för att identifiera deras behov och utveckla AI-lösningar som stöder verksamheten.

Vad du kommer att göra

Utveckling av AI-baserade lösningar:


Designa, utveckla och implementera AI/LLM för att skapa hjälpmedel som effektiviserar personalens arbete samt utveckla användarupplevelsen.
Identifiera och lösa komplexa problem med hjälp av dataanalys och AI-modeller.
Delta i utvecklingsprojekt kring långsiktiga AI-lösningar.


Dataanalys och modellering:


Arbeta med stora datamängder och utföra avancerad analys för att identifiera insikter som kan användas i verksamhetsutveckling.
Optimera och förbättra prestandan hos befintliga AI-modeller och processer.


Samarbete och strategi:


Samarbeta med olika avdelningar för att förstå deras behov och identifiera möjligheter för AI-stöd.
Bidra till strategisk planering för att utöka användningen av AI och automation inom företaget.


Teknisk innovation:


Utforska nya teknologier, ramverk och metoder inom AI.
Driva initiativ för att implementera innovativa AI-lösningar som är i linje med företagets mål.
Delta i att utveckla och implementera företagets långsiktiga AI strategi.


Mentorskap och teamutveckling:


Stötta och handleda juniora data scientists eller dataanalytiker i teamet.
Bidra till att bygga upp avdelningens kompetens och kapacitet.
Arbeta med avdelningens andra IT projekt i DevOps.


Vem du är

Vi letar efter dig som är analytisk och problemlösningsorienterad. Du är en lagspelare som både kan driva egna initiativ och samarbeta med kollegor från olika delar av organisationen. Som person är du kommunikativ och duktig på att göra komplexa koncept begripliga för en bredare publik. Du trivs i en roll där du kan inspirera andra, både genom att stötta juniora kollegor och genom att bidra till företagets långsiktiga strategi. Vi söker någon som har en stark vilja att äga sina projekt och som ser värdet i att driva förändring genom teknik.

Kvalifikationer

Din akademiska bakgrund inkluderar en master eller civilingenjörsexamen inom Data Science, Matematisk Statistik, Datavetenskap eller ett närliggande område. Alternativt Master i Finans med kompletterande studier inom matematik och datateknik.

Tekniska färdigheter:


Erfarenhet av Python, R, eller andra programmeringsspråk som används inom data science.
Kunskaper i ramverk och bibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn eller liknande.
Förståelse för databashantering (SQL, NoSQL) och molnteknologier (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med verktyg för datavisualisering som Tableau, Power BI eller Matplotlib.
LLM Integration (via API) och Prompt Engineering.


Önskvärda kompetenser:


Erfarenhet av att implementera NLP, bildigenkänning eller andra specifika AI-teknologier.
Kunskap om MLOps och DevOps-principer för maskininlärning.
Förmåga att kommunicera tekniska koncept till icke-tekniska intressenter.
Intresse av finans.


Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka företagets tekniska riktning och vara en del av ett innovativt och framåtblickande team. Vi erbjuder möjlighet till vidareutbildning, deltagande i konferenser inom AI och maskininlärning, samt flexibla arbetsförhållanden och konkurrenskraftiga förmåner.

Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan omgående då vi går igenom urvalet löpande.
Show more

  • Förståelse för databashantering (SQL, NoSQL) och molnteknologier (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med verktyg för datavisualisering som Tableau, Power BI eller Matplotlib.
  • LLM Integration (via API) och Prompt Engineering.

Önskvärda kompetenser:

  • Erfarenhet av att implementera NLP, bildigenkänning eller andra specifika AI-teknologier.
  • Kunskap om MLOps och DevOps-principer för maskininlärning.
  • Förmåga att kommunicera tekniska koncept till icke-tekniska intressenter.
  • Intresse av finans.

Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka företagets tekniska riktning och vara en del av ett innovativt och framåtblickande team. Vi erbjuder möjlighet till vidareutbildning, deltagande i konferenser inom AI och maskininlärning, samt flexibla arbetsförhållanden och konkurrenskraftiga förmåner.

Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan omgående då vi går igenom urvalet löpande.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Do you want to work with cutting-edge data science technologies to tackle critical business problems? Join us as our new Pricing Data Scientist!

As the Nordic leader in insurance, understanding and gaining insights on customer behavior and risk is at the heart of what we do. This is an opportunity to play a key role in leveraging data and analytics to accurately predict insurance risk. Your insights will drive fast and impactful decisions, influencing our 1.8 million customers in Sweden.

About The Role

As our new colleague, you will use machine learning and statistical modelling to improve our risk and pricing models. This is done by analyzing large amount of data, exploring new data sources & machine learning methods, and building end-to-end production grade machine learning pipelines. You will work in our modern analytical platform using SQL, Python, Databricks and dbt.

You will take lead on how we use structured and unstructured vehicle data for pricing in Sweden. You will be able to quickly develop, implement and monitor your improvements. Senior applicants would also have the opportunity to facilitate this work on a Nordic level, ensuring we have good knowledge sharing across If and with our sister companies Topdanmark in and Hastings (in UK).

About The Team

Our team is responsible for improving the pricing for our private customers in Sweden, a portfolio of 1.8 million customers. You will belong to a caring and high performing team of 8 people, who are passionate about data, analytics, and modelling. The team is part of an experienced and growing Nordic community who are dedicated to become the best Pricing & Analytics organization in the Nordic insurance market. We’re currently on a journey to explore and implement new and innovative ways to improve our pricing.

Who are you?

You enjoy working with tech, analytics & data and can communicate your insights to a wide audience of stakeholders. You have the creativity and curiosity to solve complex problem in new ways. You have a proactive attitude, and you challenge yourself to grow. You are structured, thorough, and have a high sense of responsibility.

We also believe that you:


Have a master’s degree in mathematics, computer science or engineering, with great results.
Think creatively about how to solve problems with machine learning and statistical modelling.
Have programming skills in SQL and Python.
Are curious to learn and try new technologies.



We’re both looking for more senior candidates and those with a couple of years of relevant experience.

Additional Facts And The Recruitment Process
Work location: Stockholm or Gothenburg

Employment: Full-time role
To apply for the position: Please include your CV and a personal letter

Application deadline: Deadline to apply is 26th January but send in your application as soon as you can since the position can be filled beforehand.

Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented.

For more information, please contact Henning Rydström, Head of Pricing & Analytics Sweden, +46 76 855 20 94.

We look forward to your application!

About Us

We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.

To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.

We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.

We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.

Come and join us!
Show more

Title: AI Developer
Description:
Xensam: SAM Disrupters

Xensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.




We look for candidates who are passionate about what they do and ready to work the Xensam way. We know that experience counts, but we also know that it’s you, the person behind the experience, that makes it count.




About the role

We at Xensam are seeking an innovative and skilled AI Developer to join our dynamic team. This role is ideal for someone with a passion for cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies.




As our AI Developer, you will be instrumental in designing, implementing, and deploying advanced AI models, with a strong focus on LLM and NLP.




Responsibilities

You will develop and fine-tune AI models, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques. You will also design and implement LLM and NLP models, employing techniques like LoRA and adapters for optimal performance. Other responsibilities that you will have:




Preprocess and engineer features for large-scale datasets, ensuring readiness for model training.
Deploy ML models to production using MLOps practices, containerization tools (e.g., Docker), and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
Utilize frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch for neural network and ML model development.
Optimize and evaluate model performance, implementing tuning strategies to improve results.
Collaborate with multiple teams using Git, CI/CD pipelines, and Agile methodologies to deliver high-quality solutions.




Qualifications

Bachelor’s or higher degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and statistical methods.
Proficiency in Python, with experience in NN and ML frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Experience in deploying machine learning models into production environments using MLOps best practices.
Familiarity with containerization tools (e.g., Docker) and cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
Expertise in preprocessing large datasets and performing feature engineering for LLM training.
Experience in training and fine-tuning LLMs and NLP models.
Familiarity with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and effective collaboration within multidisciplinary teams, communicating technical concepts clearly.
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile team.
Strong proficiency in written and spoken English and preferably Swedish.




What you get

A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
Free access to beverages, snacks, gym facilities, on-site massage, shuffleboard, and other games.
If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
Join an ambitious and diverse team, and work with cutting-edge technology in the fastest-growing SAM software on the market.
An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.




At Xensam, our core values define our culture

Rebellious: We encourage a spirit of freedom and initiative within responsibility.

Humane: We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.

Harmonious: We promote work-life balance, creating a pleasant, supportive workplace.

Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and growth-focused work environment. If you're a team player ready to thrive, APPLY now!




As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.

Show more

Title: Machine Learning Engineer - ML Planning
Description:
RaySearch is expanding in the field of machine learning to improve cancer care and is looking for a machine learning engineer to join our head office in Stockholm. Joining our team provides you with a unique opportunity to innovate and develop software that improves the lives of cancer patients around the world.

About The Position

You will be part of an agile team developing innovative solutions using machine learning (ML) algorithms to automate and support the process of improving future cancer treatments.

As a member of the ML Planning team, you will develop deep learning models for medical image analysis to be deployed at cancer clinics, helping them automating their treatment planning process. You will work closely with medical physicists and radiation oncologists and you'll incorporate their domain expertise into model architectures and validation approaches.

Your focus will extend beyond initial development to optimization of model performance, balancing prediction accuracy with clinical deployment requirements. You'll implement rigorous testing and validation frameworks to ensure model reliability in clinical settings, while leading code reviews and maintaining high standards for documentation and reproducibility.

Your profile

We think that you are passionate about machine learning techniques and algorithms with a strong drive to develop and assess innovative solutions.

We're looking for someone with proven experience developing production-grade ML systems using PyTorch or TensorFlow, and expertise in processing and analyzing image data. Experience with ML deployment pipelines, model serving architectures, and ML experiment tracking tools are a plus.

Delivering high quality results is something you take pride in, and you thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment. You are a strong team player who takes responsibility and contributes to a positive atmosphere and you are passionate about developing software for health care professionals and their patients.

Requirements



Ph.D. or M.Sc. in computer science/machine learning or equivalent
Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms
3+ years’ experience of implementing machine learning solutions
Strong programming skills in Python
Experience using deep learning libraries such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
Solid knowledge of data structures, statistics and applied mathematics
Experience training deep learning models for computer vision
Excellent spoken and written communication skills in English



Meriting



Experience using tools for MLOps
Experience in healthcare / medtech



Our Culture

Culture at RaySeach is the driving force behind our organization, where everything we do is driven by a shared passion for innovation and the fight against cancer. Our dedication is reflected in our ability to deliver exceptional results, pay close attention to detail, and consistently go the extra mile. Our employees stand out as experts in their field, driven by a relentless focus on solving problems - no matter how complex. At RaySearch, we take pride in leading the way in cancer treatment, leveraging cutting-edge technology to develop innovative solutions that make a real difference in patient care.

Our Offer

At RaySearch, we offer a diverse and inclusive work environment, fostering openness, sincerity, and collaboration. Located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, our modern and creative workspace includes an in-house gym, yoga, and social activities like ping pong, table football, and regular after-work events. Our bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and we offer morning- and afternoon-fika every day. Our rooftop terrace also provides a stunning 360-degree view of Stockholm, enhancing the work experience. All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package.

Application

Apply for the position through the application form below. Please note that we are approaching the holiday season. A response to your application may be delayed until January.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
We’re looking for a Senior Data Scientist to design, deploy, and optimize ML models that drive automation and impact key areas like credit risk and fraud detection. Join us to shape the future of ML at Froda!

About Froda

Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear mission – to democratize the access to financing and provide small businesses the same opportunities to grow as large ones. Through digital processes and technological innovation, we have shortened the loan process from months to minutes, making it easy and affordable for business owners to invest in their ideas. Our objective approach champions diversity, ensures fair terms, and ultimately enables more small businesses to make a positive impact on society.

Join our team and contribute to giving small businesses the opportunity to invest in their ideas to the best possible terms.

Your Impact

Lead the design, development, and deployment of machine learning models to drive automation and efficiency across areas like credit risk, fraud detection, AML, customer service, and business analytics. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build scalable, robust solutions that support Froda’s strategic goals of scalability, standardization, and reliability.

What You'll Do


Design, build, and deploy ML models and pipelines for critical business areas.
Collaborate with product, engineering, and analytics teams to deliver scalable AI solutions.
Lead data science projects, champion best practices, and support the growth of Froda’s ML/AI capabilities.
Implement and optimize ML-Ops workflows (data processing, model training, deployment, and monitoring).


What You'll Bring


5+ years as a Data Scientist or ML Engineer in tech, fintech, or a similar product-driven company.
Hands-on experience with production ML pipelines, ML-Ops frameworks, and cloud platforms (e.g., Azure).
Proven skills in Python, SQL, and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.).
Experience with LLMs (e.g., GPT APIs, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG).
Knowledge of credit risk, fraud detection, or AML is a plus.


Who You Are


Results-driven problem solver with a passion for impact through data and AI.
Strategic thinker who thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Strong communicator, able to break down complex ideas into clear insights.
Collaborative team player, driving innovation and knowledge-sharing across the business.


What’s in it for you?

Working at Froda means working at a company that combines the best of both worlds – fun and fast-paced culture, yet stable and structured. We are 90+ ambitious self-starters who genuinely care for each other and the work we do, while having fun together. You will have the ability to impact your own work and that the only thing standing between you and your goals is going to be your own ambitions.

Furthermore, you’ll get:


Fabulous office overlooking Stockholm and a friendly culture that values work/life balance
We prioritize working in the office to maximize the positive impact of in-person collaboration, but we offer flexibility with work hours and remote work
Competitive compensation package
Insurance and pension plan


Be part of a growing team where your work directly impacts the company’s success. Join us in driving meaningful change through AI and machine learning!
Show more

Title: Data Scientist & Startup Founder (March 2025)
Description:
This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.




Who you are:

You are a highly skilled technical professional with a proven track record in developing innovative solutions. Your strong programming abilities and experience in building complex algorithms enable you to address critical challenges within the tech industry. You are a proactive individual with a passion for progress, driven to make a significant impact through cutting-edge technological advancements.




The Antler Founder Residency

Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.

12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!




Program Details

Start Date: March 3rd, 2025
Location: Onsite at our Stockholm office
Compensation: While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
Visa Sponsorship: Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.




For our March 2025 cohort, we're looking for someone who:

Excel in Data Science, Machine Learning, or AI, with a knack for advancing technology.
Can unearth insights from intricate data, leading in ML methodologies.
Embrace the challenge of merging diverse data for revolutionary models.
Are adept at prototyping innovative solutions that pave the way for real-world applications.
Navigate product development with strategic foresight and precision.
Experienced in the start-up ecosystem
Optional: have an idea that solves a problem you’re passionate about, but you understand the need for co-pilots who share your vision and values




Application Process

Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:

Apply through our website.
Participate in an introductory interview.
Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
Receive a potential offer.




Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:

Wingbits: A community-driven flight data tracking platform
Two: A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
Evyon: A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
Glint Solar: Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
PerPlant: AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.

Role Summary

Our vision

To drive the shift by democratizing the access to knowledge and artificial intelligence fostering the transition towards a sustainable transport system. We are currently working with key initiatives ongoing to leverage AI not only for productivity gains but to fundamentally enhance and transform our current processes or even create new business opportunities across Scania and TRATON.

The Mission

In this rapidly evolving team, we’re seeking an experienced AI Engineer to help lead our mission to democratize the access to knowledge and artificial intelligence capabilities, transforming how information is consumed, analyzed, utilized and knowledge generated. We are working on enable this through innovation and by providing the necessary tools, setting up the necessary governance, and providing a great user experience”. The ideal candidate will work with the team on both developing the platform as well as supporting the implementation of business cases in order for us as an enabling team to drive and move the area forward within Scania.

Job Responsibilities



Lead and contribute to the technical development of the Generative AI platform.
Contribute towards the strategy and roadmap for the Generative AI area, together with the team.
Building, testing and deploying AI models from scratch or using the existing platform.
Conducting statistical analysis and interpreting the results to optimize the performance of AI models and systems.
Developing self-service Generative AI services.
Support the implementation of LLMOps within the team.
Support and contribute to setting AI best practices and methodologies.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to capture the business needs and develop valuable solutions.
Serve as ambassador for the area of generative AI and the AI platform both internally and externally, sharing knowledge and answering questions.



Who You Are

Must have skills and qualifications



Understanding of Transformer Architectures (BERT, GPT, T5 etc), Named Entity Recognition (NER) using Spacy Models and libraries like NLTK,Langchain Loaders,Sentiment Analysis, Topic Modeling, Text Summarization.
Experience in creating optimized RAG applications: Dense Retrieval mechanisms (e.g., DPR, ColBERT), Sparse Retrieval (BM25, TF-IDF etc.), Hybrid Retrieval (HyDE), Embedding Techniques and retrievers,Vector Databases (Faiss, Pinecone, others), Query Understanding and Expansion (Chain of Thoughts, Tree-of-Thoughts, etc.), Context-Aware Retrieval, Evaluation Metrics (Relevance, Factual Accuracy, Coherence, Diversity, Perplexity etc), Prompts (e.g., QuestionAnswerPrompt, RefinePrompt), Optimizers (e.g., OptimizerChain).
Experience with fine-tuning mechanisms.
Familiarity with the latest models such as GPT-3.5/4/4o, LLAMA, and Domain-Specific Fine-Tuning.
Experience in building self-supervised corpora, Q&A pair templates, RHLF, prompt engineering templates.
Data Collection and Curation, Preprocessing, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Feature Engineering, Data Augmentation and noise removal Techniques, familiarity with Large-Scale Datasets, Data Lakes.
Model Versioning, Experiment Tracking (Mlflow/Kubeflow, Weights & Biases), CI/CD for ML, Monitoring and Logging, Reproducibility and Provenance, Containerization (Docker), Orchestration (Kubernetes).
Familiarity with Multi-Agent AI frameworks and agentic patterns.



Programming & Tools



Python.
PyTorch/TensorFlow.
Keras.
Hugging Face.
Transformers.
Git.
Docker.
SQL.



Good to have



Knowledge about Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure), Model Serving (Flask, FastAPI), Model Compression.
Knowledge and familiarity with Traditional machine learning.



Scania Offers

We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.

Application

Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes. Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-01-19. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.

If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:

Joao Dias-Ferreira, group manager +46 7 65 166 729.

We look forward to your application!

Title: AI Software Developer
Description:
Din roll

Som AI Software Developer hos oss kommer du att arbeta som konsult och få möjlighet att samarbeta med olika kunder i varierande branscher. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av avancerade AI-applikationer. I rollen arbetar du med de senaste teknologierna inom AI och maskininlärning och tar fram lösningar som är skalbara och anpassade för våra kunders behov. Du bidrar med teknisk vägledning och fattar strategiska beslut kring arkitektur och lösningsdesign. Samtidigt stödjer och inspirerar du teamet till teknisk excellens.

Vi erbjuder en miljö där innovation och samarbete är i fokus, och du får möjlighet att vara del av ett passionerat team som arbetar med projekt i framkant av AI-teknologin. Genom rollen kommer du att få erfarenhet av olika verksamheter och tekniska miljöer, vilket gör att du utvecklas och breddar din kompetens.

Vem är du?

Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att:


Arbeta som Tech Lead eller i en liknande ledande roll inom AI-utveckling.
Ge teknisk vägledning och fatta strategiska beslut kring arkitektur och lösningsdesign.
Stödja teammedlemmar och inspirera till teknisk excellens.
Bygga AI-lösningar som är skalbara, hållbara och anpassade för kundernas behov.



Du har arbetat inom några av följande områden:


Programmering: Python (gärna med bibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch eller Scikit-learn).
AI-teknik: Erfarenhet av LLM (Large Language Models), Transformer-arkitekturer och generativa AI-verktyg.
MLOps: Erfarenhet av verktyg för AI-pipelines som Kubeflow, MLflow eller liknande.
Containerteknik: Docker och Kubernetes.
API-utveckling: REST och/eller GraphQL.
Molnplattformar: AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.



Meriterande erfarenheter

Det är extra meriterande om du har:


Kunskap om databaser som SQL eller NoSQL.
Byggt och optimerat kontinuerliga integrations- och leveransprocesser.
Erfarenhet av datavisualiseringsverktyg som Tableau eller Power BI.
Stark förståelse för matematik, statistik och optimering.
Intresse för etiska och ansvarfulla AI-principer, inklusive fairness och explainability.



Varför Knowit?

På Knowit Connectivity får du en unik möjlighet att kombinera teknik och innovation med personlig utveckling. Vi är ett team av engagerade och kunniga medarbetare som brinner för att skapa värde för våra kunder och samhället. Hos oss får du arbeta i en miljö där din kompetens tas till vara och där du får chansen att växa och utvecklas.

Vill du veta mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss? Besök vår hemsida eller kontakta oss direkt!

Låter detta som en roll för dig?

Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och diskutera hur du kan bli en del av vårt team.
Show more

  • Bygga AI-lösningar som är skalbara, hållbara och anpassade för kundernas behov.


Du har arbetat inom några av följande områden:

  • Programmering: Python (gärna med bibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch eller Scikit-learn).
  • AI-teknik: Erfarenhet av LLM (Large Language Models), Transformer-arkitekturer och generativa AI-verktyg.
  • MLOps: Erfarenhet av verktyg för AI-pipelines som Kubeflow, MLflow eller liknande.
  • Containerteknik: Docker och Kubernetes.
  • API-utveckling: REST och/eller GraphQL.
  • Molnplattformar: AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.


Meriterande erfarenheter

Det är extra meriterande om du har:

  • Kunskap om databaser som SQL eller NoSQL.
  • Byggt och optimerat kontinuerliga integrations- och leveransprocesser.
  • Erfarenhet av datavisualiseringsverktyg som Tableau eller Power BI.
  • Stark förståelse för matematik, statistik och optimering.
  • Intresse för etiska och ansvarfulla AI-principer, inklusive fairness och explainability.


Varför Knowit?

På Knowit Connectivity får du en unik möjlighet att kombinera teknik och innovation med personlig utveckling. Vi är ett team av engagerade och kunniga medarbetare som brinner för att skapa värde för våra kunder och samhället. Hos oss får du arbeta i en miljö där din kompetens tas till vara och där du får chansen att växa och utvecklas.

Vill du veta mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss? Besök vår hemsida eller kontakta oss direkt!

Låter detta som en roll för dig?

Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och diskutera hur du kan bli en del av vårt team.

Title: Data Scientist till Data & Analys
Description:
Var med och driv innovation och frigör kraften i SJs data. Genom traditionell BI, avancerad analys, maskininlärning och AI kan du skapa betydande affärsvärde och forma framtiden för SJ.




Vi söker dig som brinner för att förvandla data till insikter och möjligheter. Hos oss får du chansen att forma framtiden som en del av vår resa mot att bli ännu mer datadrivna. Du kommer att utforska, identifiera och frigöra potentialen i SJs data över hela verksamheten med hjälp av traditionell BI, avancerad analys, maskininlärning och AI. Rollen är en nyckel i att skapa värde och innovation som verkligen gör skillnad – både för SJ och våra kunder.




SJs övergripande mål är att bidra till Skandinaviens tillväxt- och klimatmål genom att leverera 50% mer resor till 2030. För att kunna realisera denna tillväxtresa gör vi historiska investeringar på 19 miljarder i nya snabbtåg, nya regionaltåg och uppgraderingar av vår befintliga fordonsflotta.




Som en viktig del av vår spännande resa satsar vi också på vår förmåga att skapa värde genom användning av data och analys. Enheten Data & Analys etablerades 2023 och ska nu skala upp förmågan för att kunna leverera brett inom koncernen. Förmågan är viktig för att framtidssäkra verksamheten och maximera nyttan från större investeringar, inte bara på fordonssidan, utan även i nya IT-system för bland annat boknings- och säljsystem, personalplanering, operativ trafikledning och intelligent fordonsunderhåll.




Din kommande roll

Som Data Scientist blir du en central del av vårt nybildade team Data & Analys. Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas i en roll där du kommer att:




Driva spännande projekt från idéstadiet till färdig lösning, med direkt påverkan på företagets framgång
Arbeta med hela datahanteringsprocessen, inklusive insamling, förberedelse, modellering och visualisering av data
Implementera innovativa lösningar i produktionsmiljöer och hantera stora datamängder för att upptäcka värdefulla insikter
Kommunicera dina fynd till olika intressenter och hjälpa till att omvandla tekniska insikter till konkreta affärsstrategier
Utforska och experimentera med modern teknik för att förbättra våra processer. Du kommer balansera snabb experimentell utveckling med skapandet av strukturerad och underhållsbar kod för produktion




Enheten Data & Analys är en del av Ekonomifunktionen och arbetar tillsammans med IT-divisionen, samt nära med Strategi & Verksamhetsutveckling och Business Control som båda återfinns inom Ekonomi.




Förväntningar på den vi söker

En akademisk examen inom datavetenskap, statistik, matematik, fysik eller liknande område
Stark programmeringskompetens i Python och SQL
Erfarenhet av molnbaserade miljöer; kunskap om Azure Databricks är ett stort plus
Förståelse för agila arbetsmetoder och moderna utvecklingsprinciper som DevOps och CI/CD
En analytisk och nyfiken natur, med en passion för att lösa komplexa problem
Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och förmåga att göra tekniska koncept begripliga för icke-tekniska intressenter
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift
Meriterande är erfarenheter av prediktivt underhåll




Ansökan och information

Urval sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, dock senast den 23 januari 2025.




I den här rekryteringen samarbetar SJ med Jefferson Wells och Experis. Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta ansvariga rekryteringskonsulter Malin Magnusson, 076-7806864, malin.magnusson@jeffersonwells.se, och Anki Snis, 0703-775969, anki.snis@se.experis.com.

Show more

Title: Fullstack Data scientist
Description:
We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer / Fullstack Data Scientist that loves to solve problems and want to be part of rethinking the recruitment industry. You will be responsible for building our machine learning system and algorithm and support in the design of of the company's architecture, The person we are looking for will work closely with the CPO, and build our greenfield ML/MI solution with python. We think that you will thrive here, if you are more interested in solving problems, than in doing tickets.




This is a full-time hybrid role for a Machine Learning Engineer / Fullstack Data Scientist at Worko located in Stockholm, with flexibility for remote work 3-4 days a week. The role involves building our machine learning back-end, model and algorithm. The responsibilities include data analysis, model development, and coding and setting up our machine learning environment.




Qualifications

Strong programming skills, (Python, etc)
Computer Science skills
Experience with with MLOps in Azure, and Databricks or similar
Statistics skills
Proficiency in algorithm design and optimization
Excellent problem-solving abilities







Why Worko




Worko is set out to re-think the recruitment industry! We are currently active in the Nordics, but are looking to scale our innovation.

The company culture is to constantly push each other and to develop each other, our customers, and our platform.

This is an opportunity to be part of a growth journey, where we aim to be in the fore front technically, and are not afraid to try new thing incorporating MI/LLM development,




You will be given the opportunity to influence your work tremendously and work closely with the CPO , management team and the company's founder, and technical board members.

Title: Senior ML Engineer
Description:
Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?




Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.




Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than 400 million active users per month.
Founded in 2009 with an impressive year-on-year growth with high profitability, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm, Large Cap.
Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorised as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.




We, at the Data Science and Analytics Products team, build centralised data products that serve the business and our customers. We collaborate across all of Truecaller, delivering products that require centralised ownership or where the competence to build the products is not present in the wider product organisation.




As a Senior ML Engineer, you will be working hands-on to optimise training and deployment of ML models to be quick and cost-efficient. You will also be at the forefront of putting our ML models on mobile devices to enhance data privacy and customer experience. To achieve this you will need to collaborate with teams across Truecaller to establish best practices and tools for efficient ML model development and deployment, particularly on mobile platforms. You will be expected to help Truecaller reach and stay at the cutting edge of ML training and deployment, as well as explore new frontiers such as federated learning.




The impact you will create:




Understand the current and future needs of developers and the organisation, and create a roadmap with your manager for meeting those needs.
Work with teams throughout Truecaller, enabling them to put models into production quickly and cost-effectively.
Work hands-on with teams throughout Truecaller to optimise ML models for mobile devices.
Be the go-to expert for developing models for mobile devices as well as deploying them.
Staying up to date with the latest trends and technologies in ML Engineering, especially ML on mobile phones, and driving continuous innovation throughout Truecaller.




What you bring in:




5+ years of experience in machine learning engineering, with a focus on deploying ML models in production environments.
A strong understanding and experience how to optimise feature engineering, model training, and model deployment.
Hands-on experience deploying ML models on mobile devices (e.g., TensorFlow Lite, Core ML, ONNX Runtime Mobile).
Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, ONNX) and their deployment on mobile platforms.
Understanding of both Android and iOS development and how that impacts ML model deployment and usage.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across different teams and disciplines.
A customer-focused mindset.
Excellent communication skills in spoken and written English.




It would be great if you also have:




Hands-on experience developing ML models.




Life at Truecaller - Behind the code: https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/




Sounds like your dream job?




We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.

This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

We only accept applications in English.




What we offer:




A smart, talented, and agile team: An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
A great compensation package: Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
Great tech tools: Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
Office life: We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, now and then check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There is something for everyone!




Come as you are:




Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc. All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
Irori is a startup culture with a mission to make systems integration easy.

We work with critical systems in finance, retail, transportation, medtech and government sectors where we provide specialist skills and managed software for customers. We enable event driven architectures that make trusted data accessible for consumers in real time.




As a member of Irori

You will engage in hands-on problem-solving across application development, integration design, DevOps tooling, and Infrastructure as Code. Beyond helping clients build successful digital products, we invest in applied learning together. We run sandbox environments on GCP and Azure to explore new technologies, and we develop open-source products to fill gaps in the ecosystem.




Expect to collaborate with top-tier colleagues known for their technical excellence and reliable support.







Your Growth as a Junior Software Engineer

With long-term growth in mind, you’ll begin with the fundamentals of software craftsmanship and integration design principles, then progress into specific technology applications. Our pace is high yet fair, and we foster a supportive environment where everyone is enabled to grow. We believe that autonomy to choose is key in making work fulfilling and engaging.







Our success is built on trusting relationships.







Who you are

Highly driven individual with sound judgment, critical thinking ability and a high capacity to learn.
You enjoy a culture with a high level of trust.
Transparent - this helps you to learn as an individual, but it also leads to great solutions among the team.
You have the ability to take measured risks, have long term determination and a well balanced lifestyle. We believe in compounding growth both as individuals and as a team.




Qualifications

Recently completed your studies within Computer Science, Physics, IT, Electrical or similar areas or have exceptional skills acquired by other means.
You are passionate about systems development and/or cloud infrastructure and would like to build tomorrow’s technology landscape.
You speak Swedish fluently or have a firm determination to acquire practical proficiency soon.




The journey

Together we will develop broad skills to lead technological innovation in our chosen field. As we move forward we will work with and learn from an excellent team and add responsibilities to match our personal motivations. Initially we will focus on the basics of high quality systems design and development. From there we will specialize in one or more of our core areas. During these phases you will gain valuable experience from client teams. From there you can advance to senior consulting heading customer teams or entrepreneurial responsibilities within the Irori value stream. We will always match opportunities to individual motivations.




Application

We look forward to your resume and cover letter. We will review your application and book an interview with qualified candidates.

Kommunicera dina fynd till olika intressenter och hjälpa till att omvandla tekniska insikter till konkreta affärsstrategier
Utforska och experimentera med modern teknik för att förbättra våra processer. Du kommer balansera snabb experimentell utveckling med skapandet av strukturerad och underhållsbar kod för produktion


Enheten Data & Analys är en del av Ekonomifunktionen och arbetar tillsammans med IT-divisionen, samt nära med Strategi & Verksamhetsutveckling och Business Control som båda återfinns inom Ekonomi.

Förväntningar på den vi söker


En akademisk examen inom datavetenskap, statistik, matematik, fysik eller liknande område
Stark programmeringskompetens i Python och SQL
Erfarenhet av molnbaserade miljöer; kunskap om Azure Databricks är ett stort plus
Förståelse för agila arbetsmetoder och moderna utvecklingsprinciper som DevOps och CI/CD
En analytisk och nyfiken natur, med en passion för att lösa komplexa problem
Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och förmåga att göra tekniska koncept begripliga för icke-tekniska intressenter
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift
Meriterande är erfarenheter av prediktivt underhåll
Show more
HTML:
Var med och driv innovation och frigör kraften i SJs data. Genom traditionell BI, avancerad analys, maskininlärning och AI kan du skapa betydande affärsvärde och forma framtiden för SJ.

Vi söker dig som brinner för att förvandla data till insikter och möjligheter. Hos oss får du chansen att forma framtiden som en del av vår resa mot att bli ännu mer datadrivna. Du kommer att utforska, identifiera och frigöra potentialen i SJs data över hela verksamheten med hjälp av traditionell BI, avancerad analys, maskininlärning och AI. Rollen är en nyckel i att skapa värde och innovation som verkligen gör skillnad - både för SJ och våra kunder.

SJs övergripande mål är att bidra till Skandinaviens tillväxt- och klimatmål genom att leverera 50% mer resor till 2030. För att kunna realisera denna tillväxtresa gör vi historiska investeringar på 19 miljarder i nya snabbtåg, nya regionaltåg och uppgraderingar av vår befintliga fordonsflotta.

Som en viktig del av vår spännande resa satsar vi också på vår förmåga att skapa värde genom användning av data och analys. Enheten Data & Analys etablerades 2023 och ska nu skala upp förmågan för att kunna leverera brett inom koncernen. Förmågan är viktig för att framtidssäkra verksamheten och maximera nyttan från större investeringar, inte bara på fordonssidan, utan även i nya IT-system för bland annat boknings- och säljsystem, personalplanering, operativ trafikledning och intelligent fordonsunderhåll.

Din kommande roll

Som Data Scientist blir du en central del av vårt nybildade team Data & Analys. Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas i en roll där du kommer att:

  • Driva spännande projekt från idéstadiet till färdig lösning, med direkt påverkan på företagets framgång
  • Arbeta med hela datahanteringsprocessen, inklusive insamling, förberedelse, modellering och visualisering av data
  • Implementera innovativa lösningar i produktionsmiljöer och hantera stora datamängder för att upptäcka värdefulla insikter
  • Kommunicera dina fynd till olika intressenter och hjälpa till att omvandla tekniska insikter till konkreta affärsstrategier
  • Utforska och experimentera med modern teknik för att förbättra våra processer. Du kommer balansera snabb experimentell utveckling med skapandet av strukturerad och underhållsbar kod för produktion

Enheten Data & Analys är en del av Ekonomifunktionen och arbetar tillsammans med IT-divisionen, samt nära med Strategi & Verksamhetsutveckling och Business Control som båda återfinns inom Ekonomi.

Förväntningar på den vi söker

  • En akademisk examen inom datavetenskap, statistik, matematik, fysik eller liknande område
  • Stark programmeringskompetens i Python och SQL
  • Erfarenhet av molnbaserade miljöer; kunskap om Azure Databricks är ett stort plus
  • Förståelse för agila arbetsmetoder och moderna utvecklingsprinciper som DevOps och CI/CD
  • En analytisk och nyfiken natur, med en passion för att lösa komplexa problem
  • Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och förmåga att göra tekniska koncept begripliga för icke-tekniska intressenter
  • Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift
  • Meriterande är erfarenheter av prediktivt underhåll

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Python Developer for a Fast-Growing Startup 🚀




Are you a skilled backend developer looking to make a real impact in an ambitious and fast-paced environment?

As part of their team you'll have the opportunity to help shape a product that genuinely improves people’s everyday lives. 🙌




What You’ll Do

🚀 Enhance and expand their platform.
🤝 Collaborate closely with other developers and key stakeholders to identify and address customer needs.
🛠️ Take ownership of projects, driving both development and improvements.




What They're Looking For

🧠 2–3 years of experience in web development, with strong Python skills.
🔍 An analytical mindset and passion for clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
🌐 A solid understanding of digital transformation and industry modernization.
A bonus: Django development, Open API's and integrations, AWS (or other cloud environments)




Why Join Them?

🎉 Be part of an enthusiastic, collaborative team where your contributions matter.
💡 Join a company culture that values creativity, learning, and mutual support.
🏢 Work from a central location with flexibility to suit your lifestyle.
📈 Access career development opportunities in a rapidly scaling startup.







If you’re excited about being a key player in building something transformative and contributing to a growth journey, we’d love to hear from you! ✨ Send us your CV and portfolio today!

Title: Pricing Data Scientist - Motor
Description:
What about the role?

We are now looking for a Pricing Data Scientist with specific expertise in motor insurance to join our ambitious team at Hedvig. As a Pricing Data Scientist, you will create and refine machine learning models that ensure fair, data-driven pricing for our motor product. Working closely with Backend Developers, ML Engineers, Data Analysts and the rest of the pricing team, you will have the opportunity to shape and use the data and tools that fuel our innovative pricing. This offers an inspiring freedom in what you will be able to create. You will also contribute to and develop our whole data stack in GCP using tools such as Fivetran, dbt, Vertex AI and Looker.

More information about our data stack and what we do can be found in this Heroes of Data blog post.




Responsibilities include but are not limited to:

Design, develop and deploy machine learning models for motor insurance pricing
Drive motor-focused projects from raw data to deployed model and tracking of performance
Design, build and test data models that reflect our business processes and objectives, mainly for pricing
Contribute to building and enhancing our data infrastructure that will not only serve our 100,000+ customers but also everyone who works at Hedvig.
Be part of testing ideas and hypotheses using our tools and machine learning
Support and collaborate with other developers to form and optimize processes for collecting, testing, and governing data across the data stack
Be a guiding star, always on the lookout for new trends within data and pricing




What about you?

You have at least 2-5 years of experience from working with motor insurance pricing
You have a University degree in engineering or have acquired similar knowledge elsewhere
You are a skilled Python developer with focus on machine learning
You feel empowered by working in an end-to-end modern data stack with tools like BigQuery. dbt, Looker, etc.
You are comfortable with transforming data using SQL
You consider yourself a coder and understand that treating data as code is a no-brainer and requires testing, source control, and an agile way of working
You are curious, well structured and a self starter
You are fluent in English




What about us?

As part of the Hedvig team, you quickly notice that "general truths" are not accepted without being questioned. We're an enthusiastic group of people who love to challenge each other to find the best way forward. We don't care who says something; we care about what's being said. We put a lot of effort into building a trusting culture where freedom, collective thinking, and individual ownership have center stage. We're not perfect – far from it – but we talk about and learn from our mistakes and imperfections to improve continuously. And we have a lot of fun along the way! As individuals, as a team, and as a company.




Come join the Hedvig team, including all of our very loved office pups, in newly renovated offices in central Stockholm.

Show more

Title: Machine Learning Expert & Data Engineer
Description:
Vi är Sveriges största rikstäckande och oberoende mäklarkedja. Hos oss blir du en del av ett engagerat team av 1250 kollegor som stöttar varandra och utvecklas tillsammans. Vi erbjuder dig som medarbetare att bli delägare och vi har under flera år utsetts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare.

Vårt fokus är att vara ledande idag och i framtiden. Under 85 år har vi skapat nya erbjudanden och utvecklat mäklarbranschen. År 2021 förmedlade Svensk Fastighetsförmedling nästan 32 000 bostäder till ett värde av cirka 87 miljarder kronor.

Koncernen består idag av Svensk Fastighetsförmedling, Ordna Bolån och HouseID.

Svensk Fastighetsförmedlingsgruppen söker en driven, självgående och innovativ Machine Learning Expert & Data Engineer. Hos oss får du möjligheten att arbeta med banbrytande teknik och datainsamling och AI lösningar för att skapa smarta och enkla lösningar som förbättrar människors boendeliv. Nu finns chansen att bli en nyckelspelare i att skapa och driva vårt centrala AI projekt och bli en del av vårt engagerade team och bidra till en mer hållbar bostads- och finansmarknad.

Om tjänsten

Som Machine Learning Expert och Data Engineer spelar du en nyckelroll i utvecklingen och underhållet av vår digitala värderingstjänst och att skapa värde. Rollen är ny och det finns stora möjligheter att utforma både roll, produkt och teknik. Du kommer att arbeta med att utveckla och förbättra vår AVM-modell, hantera infrastrukturen och träna modellen med hjälp av data från olika källor.

Ansvarsområden


Utveckla och förbättra AVM-modellen för bostadsvärdering.
Designa och underhålla den tekniska infrastrukturen för datainsamling och modellträning.
Implementera och optimera data pipelines för att skrapa och bearbeta data från olika källor.
Träna och validera maskininlärningsmodeller med hjälp av insamlad data.
Säkerställa att API:er är robusta och tillgängliga för integration med andra företag.
Samarbeta med andra teammedlemmar för att säkerställa att lösningarna uppfyller affärsbehoven.
Driva förflyttning inom området och säkra att vi skapar värde genom tjänsten.


Du rapporterar till Chief Experience Officer.

Om dig

Vi söker dig som har minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet från liknande roller och som är självgående med en förmåga att planera och driva ditt eget arbete mot uppsatta mål. Du är kommunikativ, har lätt att förklara och förenkla komplexa frågor och har en förmåga att kommunicera mot stakeholders och intressenter. Du gillar att kombinera eget arbete och samarbete med andra.

Kvalifikationer


Dokumenterad relevant utbildning
Minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande relevanta tjänster
Flytande i svenska
Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
Stark kunskap inom data engineering och hantering av stora datamängder
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Python, R eller liknande programmeringsspråk
Erfarenhet av att använda verktyg och teknologier som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Apache Spark, och liknande
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med API:er och integrera dem i olika system
God förståelse för databaser och SQL
Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team
Stark problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.


Meriterande


Erfarenhet av fastighetsvärdering eller liknande bransch
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnplattformar som AWS, Google Cloud eller Azure
Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en agil utvecklingsmiljö.


Om Oss

Svensk Fastighetsförmedlings gruppens vision är att skapa ett ekosystem för boendelivet där värden växer. Vi utvecklar och erbjuder nya attraktiva tjänster både innan, under och efter bytet av bostad. Genom att utgå ifrån kundens situation och drivkrafter när vi utvecklar vår affär och erbjudande, blir vi mer relevanta och vi vidgar vår affär för att kunna ta en större roll i människors liv och hjälpa dem till ett hållbart boendeliv. Det ligger i linje med att hemmet får en allt större betydelse för människor, man vill leva ett medvetet och välmående liv och måendet påverkas i stor grad av hur man bor och hur man trivs i området. Koncernen består idag av Svensk Fastighetsförmedling, Sveriges största oberoende mäklarkedja, Ordna Bolån en oberoende bolånetjänst och intressebolaget House ID som hjälper kunder till att utveckla och ta hand om sitt hem. Vårt huvudkontor ligger centralt i Stockholm med lokaler på Vasagatan 28.

Läs mer om oss här

https://jobb.svenskfast.se/

https://www.facebook.com/svenskfastkarriar/ https://www.instagram.com/livetpasvenskfast/

Välkommen in med din ansökan.
Show more

Vi är Sveriges största rikstäckande och oberoende mäklarkedja. Hos oss blir du en del av ett engagerat team av 1250 kollegor som stöttar varandra och utvecklas tillsammans. Vi erbjuder dig som medarbetare att bli delägare och vi har under flera år utsetts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare.

Vårt fokus är att vara ledande idag och i framtiden. Under 85 år har vi skapat nya erbjudanden och utvecklat mäklarbranschen. År 2021 förmedlade Svensk Fastighetsförmedling nästan 32 000 bostäder till ett värde av cirka 87 miljarder kronor.

Koncernen består idag av Svensk Fastighetsförmedling, Ordna Bolån och HouseID.

Svensk Fastighetsförmedlingsgruppen söker en driven, självgående och innovativ Machine Learning Expert & Data Engineer. Hos oss får du möjligheten att arbeta med banbrytande teknik och datainsamling och AI lösningar för att skapa smarta och enkla lösningar som förbättrar människors boendeliv. Nu finns chansen att bli en nyckelspelare i att skapa och driva vårt centrala AI projekt och bli en del av vårt engagerade team och bidra till en mer hållbar bostads- och finansmarknad.

Om tjänsten

Som Machine Learning Expert och Data Engineer spelar du en nyckelroll i utvecklingen och underhållet av vår digitala värderingstjänst och att skapa värde. Rollen är ny och det finns stora möjligheter att utforma både roll, produkt och teknik. Du kommer att arbeta med att utveckla och förbättra vår AVM-modell, hantera infrastrukturen och träna modellen med hjälp av data från olika källor.

Ansvarsområden

  • Utveckla och förbättra AVM-modellen för bostadsvärdering.
  • Designa och underhålla den tekniska infrastrukturen för datainsamling och modellträning.
  • Implementera och optimera data pipelines för att skrapa och bearbeta data från olika källor.
  • Träna och validera maskininlärningsmodeller med hjälp av insamlad data.
  • Säkerställa att API:er är robusta och tillgängliga för integration med andra företag.
  • Samarbeta med andra teammedlemmar för att säkerställa att lösningarna uppfyller affärsbehoven.
  • Driva förflyttning inom området och säkra att vi skapar värde genom tjänsten.

Du rapporterar till Chief Experience Officer.

Om dig

Vi söker dig som har minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet från liknande roller och som är självgående med en förmåga att planera och driva ditt eget arbete mot uppsatta mål. Du är kommunikativ, har lätt att förklara och förenkla komplexa frågor och har en förmåga att kommunicera mot stakeholders och intressenter. Du gillar att kombinera eget arbete och samarbete med andra.

Kvalifikationer

  • Dokumenterad relevant utbildning
  • Minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande relevanta tjänster
  • Flytande i svenska
  • Erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller
  • Stark kunskap inom data engineering och hantering av stora datamängder
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Python, R eller liknande programmeringsspråk
  • Erfarenhet av att använda verktyg och teknologier som TensorFlow, PyTorch, Apache Spark, och liknande
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med API:er och integrera dem i olika system
  • God förståelse för databaser och SQL
  • Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team
  • Stark problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.

Meriterande

  • Erfarenhet av fastighetsvärdering eller liknande bransch
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnplattformar som AWS, Google Cloud eller Azure
  • Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en agil utvecklingsmiljö.

Om Oss

Svensk Fastighetsförmedlings gruppens vision är att skapa ett ekosystem för boendelivet där värden växer. Vi utvecklar och erbjuder nya attraktiva tjänster både innan, under och efter bytet av bostad. Genom att utgå ifrån kundens situation och drivkrafter när vi utvecklar vår affär och erbjudande, blir vi mer relevanta och vi vidgar vår affär för att kunna ta en större roll i människors liv och hjälpa dem till ett hållbart boendeliv. Det ligger i linje med att hemmet får en allt större betydelse för människor, man vill leva ett medvetet och välmående liv och måendet påverkas i stor grad av hur man bor och hur man trivs i området. Koncernen består idag av Svensk Fastighetsförmedling, Sveriges största oberoende mäklarkedja, Ordna Bolån en oberoende bolånetjänst och intressebolaget House ID som hjälper kunder till att utveckla och ta hand om sitt hem. Vårt huvudkontor ligger centralt i Stockholm med lokaler på Vasagatan 28.

Läs mer om oss här

https://jobb.svenskfast.se/

https://www.facebook.com/svenskfastkarriar/ https://www.instagram.com/livetpasvenskfast/

Välkommen in med din ansökan.

Title: AI Engineering Intern
Description:
About Nordiska

Nordiska is a credit institution that provides innovative financial services for both individuals and companies. We offer a banking-as-a-service platform through our savings and loan service infrastructure, either under our own brand or through partners. Nordiska also focuses on corporate and real estate financing as well as sustainable savings with government deposit insurance.




Our innovative platform empowers partners to provide in-house financial services to their customers seamlessly with our APIs and plug-and-play technology. Our platform is designed to facilitate all forms of ideas, irrespective of the market or volume. If you're interested in being a part of our fast-growing team and help shape the future of financial services, apply to join us today! We are currently looking for an AI Engineering Intern to join our Data & Analytics team in Stockholm. Note that this role can be adjusted to fit your current study situation, so part/full time are both options.




We offer

We offer a chance to be part of a positive and engaged community where everyone's contribution is important to our growth and success. As a part of Nordiska, you will receive the necessary conditions and support to develop within your own area of expertise, as well as learn about other parts of the business to advance within the company. We provide a fast-paced, open, and motivating work environment with skilled colleagues, where everyone collaborates to achieve our goals together.




About the role

As AI Engineering Intern you will be part of our Data & Analytics team, operating within a cutting-edge, cloud-based environment. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on our AI projects, contributing to the development and enhancement of our innovative financial platform. You will collaborate with engineers, gaining hands-on experience in solving real life problems by applying generative AI. This internship will provide you with a unique chance to grow your skills in a fast-paced, supportive environment, and make a tangible impact on our products and services.




Requirements

Currently pursuing or recently completed a Master's degree in a technical field such as engineering or computer science.
Strong foundation in machine learning algorithms and statistical analysis.
Proficiency in a programming language such as Python, C#, Scala or similar.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen interest in generative AI and machine learning.
Strong communication skills, both in Swedish and English.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.




Nice to have

Prior experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Knowledge of OpenAI’s GPT models.
Knowledge of financial services and fintech industry trends.
Understanding of big data technologies and tools.




At Nordiska, we're passionate about building the next generation of cloud-based financial services, and we're seeking a talented AI Engineering Intern to join us. If you're someone who loves working with technology and thrives in a fast-paced environment, we'd love to hear from you!




Contact

For more information contact Filip Björnsjö on +46 (0) 73 543 22 44 or filip.bjornsjo@nordiska.com
